description:
Hey! You! The hard-boiled reptile I can definitely see holding this game. You’re the perfect person to help Pat the Alligator uncover the secret behind the mysterious “event” his family’s planning for him in the heart of Alligator New York City.

- Meet over 100 animated alligators and solve their problems
- Beat them in 31 joke-filled minigames and challenges
- Uncover one of multiple endings—plus a secret surprise
- Sneak around the big city while smooth alligator jazz plays
- But watch the clock: The Event is happening soon, and Pat is VERY nervous about it!
name: Later Alligator
